content.text: Open Market provides access to multiple buyers and sellers in the jewelry ecosystem. Real-time price discovery and competitive bidding available.
All transactions are secured with escrow services and digital signatures. Payment release only after successful delivery confirmation.
Platform fee of 1.5% per transaction from both buyer and seller. Premium features available at â‚¹8,999/month subscription.
Strict compliance with market regulations required. Price manipulation, false listings, or fraudulent activities result in immediate account suspension.
User data is protected as per Indian Data Protection laws. Transaction history and personal information are encrypted and not shared with third parties.
Market operates 24/7 except during scheduled maintenance. All transactions timestamped and recorded for audit purposes.
All participants must complete KYC verification. Business license and trade permits required for commercial sellers.
All listings must be within 10% of current market rates. Pricing significantly above or below market rates may be flagged for review.
Platform provides free mediation services for transaction disputes. Final arbitration through registered arbitration centers if required.
